string.name: challengesX
string.comment: %1$s is the number of challenges. Appears as hover text for challenge notifications.

resources.string: utala: %1$s
wile musi
ona li wile ala musi
ona li wile musi a!
wile musi li weka.
o kama tawa la sina ken utala musi.
sina ken ala utala musi e %s.
%s li utala musi ala.
sona sina li %1$s li weka tan %2$s.
sina ken ala utala musi e jan. nasin %s la nanpa wawa sina li ken pini.
jan pona li ken utala musi e jan %s. sina li jan pona ala.
mi wile ala musi lon tenpo ni.

string.name: declineLater
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: mi ken ala musi lon tenpo ni. toki tawa mi lon tenpo ante.

string.name: declineTooFast
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: tenpo musi ni li lili mute tawa mi. musi pi tenpo mute la o utala musi e mi.

string.name: declineTooSlow
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: tenpo musi ni li suli mute tawa mi. musi pi tenpo lili la o utala musi e mi.

string.name: declineTimeControl
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: tenpo li ni la mi wile ala musi.

string.name: declineRated
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: mi wile kama jo e nanpa wawa. sina wile e ni la o utala musi e mi.

string.name: declineCasual
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: mi wile ala kama jo e nanpa wawa. sina wile ala e ni la o utala musi e mi.

string.name: declineStandard
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: mi wile ala musi kepeken nasin ante lon tenpo ni.

string.name: declineVariant
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: mi wile ala musi kepeken nasin ni lon tenpo ni.
mi wile ala e ni: jan ilo li utala musi e mi.
mi wile e ni: jan ilo li utala musi e mi.

string.name: inviteLichessUser
string.comment: Appears when using the 'play with a friend' button. This option lets you create a challenge on Lichess. The alternative is to send the player a URL.

resources.string: anu tawa e jan ilo Lichess:
